<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// shouldEvict - determine if A should evict the assigned live range B. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// eviction policy defined by this function together with the allocation order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// defined by enqueue() decides which registers ultimately end up being split</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and spilled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Cascade numbers are used to prevent infinite loops if this function is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cyclic relation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param A          The live range to be assigned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param IsHint     True when A is about to be assigned to its preferred</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                   register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param B          The live range to be evicted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param BreaksHint True when B is already assigned to its preferred register.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// canEvictInterferenceBasedOnCost - Return true if all interferences between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// VirtReg and PhysReg can be evicted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param VirtReg Live range that is about to be assigned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param PhysReg Desired register for assignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param IsHint  True when PhysReg is VirtReg&#39;s preferred register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param MaxCost Only look for cheaper candidates and update with new cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                when returning true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @returns True when interference can be evicted cheaper than MaxCost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefaultEvictionAdvisor::canEvictInterferenceBasedOnCost(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsHint,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evictioncost">EvictionCost</a> &amp;MaxCost, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1d6cfdcc234093f39fb0719ddb649500">SmallVirtRegSet</a> &amp;FixedRegisters)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is only possible to evict virtual register interference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#ad92ce3f6ffed2f967f22e87b8ff84400">Matrix</a>-&gt;checkInterference(VirtReg, PhysReg) &gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aa30186d61b40f517e8dc5d9e85076a91f">LiveRegMatrix::IK&#95;VirtReg</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsLocal = VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#a66ff664a97cd3c30de7e873335a0c075">empty</a>() || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#ac66a00c77cf643e5e9f9074bf0f96425">LIS</a>-&gt;intervalIsInOneMBB(VirtReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find VirtReg&#39;s cascade number. This will be unassigned if VirtReg was never</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// involved in an eviction before. If a cascade number was assigned, deny</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// evicting anything with the same or a newer cascade number. This prevents</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// infinite eviction loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This works out so a register without a cascade number is allowed to evict</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anything, and it can be evicted by anything.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Cascade = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#a81658f4e8af40f2d2a6bb91ea807042b">RA</a>.getExtraInfo().getCascadeOrCurrentNext(VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EvictionCost <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8adc81fee7f9e66260dd2b626660c9c9">MCRegUnit</a> Unit : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#a00156681d3902a949b4c2e1dfe97bb15">TRI</a>-&gt;regunits(PhysReg)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LiveIntervalUnion::Query &amp;Q = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#ad92ce3f6ffed2f967f22e87b8ff84400">Matrix</a>-&gt;query(VirtReg, Unit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is 10 or more interferences, chances are one is heavier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Interferences = Q.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#a6d5858ffe61498c3109205046a16a98b">interferingVRegs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab63f91ae5ac55f63e6c92be23a29016a">EvictInterferenceCutoff</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Interferences.size() &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab63f91ae5ac55f63e6c92be23a29016a">EvictInterferenceCutoff</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if any interfering live range is heavier than MaxWeight.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &#42;Intf : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(Interferences)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Intf-&gt;reg().isVirtual() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not allow eviction of a virtual register if we are in the middle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of last-chance recoloring and this virtual register is one that we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have scavenged a physical register for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FixedRegisters.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#a2a98f19750ba941ce791b75ca6d77e48">count</a>(Intf-&gt;reg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Never evict spill products. They cannot split or spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#a81658f4e8af40f2d2a6bb91ea807042b">RA</a>.getExtraInfo().getStage(&#42;Intf) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4ab3dc0864c572a7f8895334b0f8d235d4">RS&#95;Done</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Once a live range becomes small enough, it is urgent that we find a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register for it. This is indicated by an infinite spill weight. These</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// urgent live ranges get to evict almost anything.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also allow urgent evictions of unspillable ranges from a strictly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// larger allocation order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Urgent =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a1a07a284547e2997c90a6a1be428cd47">isSpillable</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (Intf-&gt;isSpillable() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#a6311e341e3f7596d6fb11d181dc251ed">RegClassInfo</a>.getNumAllocatableRegs(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#a5d4eb87adc2921aca1db9e5270ad210e">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>())) &lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#a6311e341e3f7596d6fb11d181dc251ed">RegClassInfo</a>.getNumAllocatableRegs(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only evict older cascades or live ranges without a cascade.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntfCascade = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#a81658f4e8af40f2d2a6bb91ea807042b">RA</a>.getExtraInfo().getCascade(Intf-&gt;reg());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Cascade == IntfCascade)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Cascade &lt; IntfCascade) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Urgent)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We permit breaking cascades for urgent evictions. It should be the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// last resort, though, so make it really expensive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.BrokenHints += 10;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Would this break a satisfied hint?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BreaksHint = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#a6e2aaf9500c32aa637f07121dc21fd17">VRM</a>-&gt;hasPreferredPhys(Intf-&gt;reg());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update eviction cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.BrokenHints += BreaksHint;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.MaxWeight = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.MaxWeight, Intf-&gt;weight());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Abort if this would be too expensive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &lt; MaxCost))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Urgent)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply the eviction policy for non-urgent evictions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!shouldEvict(VirtReg, IsHint, &#42;Intf, BreaksHint))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If !MaxCost.isMax(), then we&#39;re just looking for a cheap register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Evicting another local live range in this case could lead to suboptimal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coloring.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MaxCost.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evictioncost/#a448edc968e9496c021b525db32d4fd7b">isMax</a>() &amp;&amp; IsLocal &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#ac66a00c77cf643e5e9f9074bf0f96425">LIS</a>-&gt;intervalIsInOneMBB(&#42;Intf) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#ab1e7ca6190354a4ad9bb230a96622bae">EnableLocalReassign</a> || !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisor/#ab0ec56bd57b2676e33aa9f1b0213f0a4">canReassign</a>(&#42;Intf, PhysReg))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> DefaultEvictionAdvisor::tryFindEvictionCandidate(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;VirtReg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocationorder">AllocationOrder</a> &amp;Order,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t CostPerUseLimit, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1d6cfdcc234093f39fb0719ddb649500">SmallVirtRegSet</a> &amp;FixedRegisters)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of the cheapest interference seen so far.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EvictionCost BestCost;</span></CodeLine>
